title: Wonder Women - Rural Victorians
abstract: Stories from Victorian country women working in business, community, farming and family life.
description: Women living and working in country Victoria contribute to the local area in many ways. These short documentary works show the diversity of women in rural Victoria and how they each bring something unique to their work and community at large. Whether they be a surfer, farmer, hip-hop artist, puppeteer, nurse, community worker or business woman - all are passionate about the area in which they live and share their insights into country living, work and family life.  Areas of Victoria the stories come from include:  Mt Alexander, the Bass Coast, Mildura, Indigo, South Gippsland, East Gippsland and Wangaratta.  These works were originally filmed as part of the ACMI in the Regions Program and represent a sample of some of the many stories of women working in and contributing to country Victoria in the Program.
